name: Tesla 2040
description:
Nikola Tesla was about to finish his Wardenclyffe experiment when saw that his laboratory is being destroyed…

Life of Tesla was covered with mystery: Tunguska event, Colorado springs glowing fields and unfinished Wardenclyffe experiment on transmitting power world-wide through AEther.
Play Nikola Tesla alternative story based game:

— 1900 Victorian-Punk and 2040 Sci-Fi setting

— Dynamic Tactical Top-Down shooter gameplay

— Co-op multiplayer up to 4 players

— Research system

— Time-attack gameplay: The faster you finish levels, the more bonus time you can spend on research

— Complete missions for different corporations unlock and research futuristic technologies and abilities.

— Destructible environment

— Become the Prometheus of 21 century or one of the richest people, it's up to You!

— ...And don't forget your lightning WHIP!
